product_name: Roxy Sea Blazer Hoody Paddle Jacket - Women's
long_description: Designed to get wet and stay warm, the Roxy Sea Blazer Hoody Paddle Jacket offers stylish lightweight insulation when you're paddleboarding, kayaking, surfing and otherwise playing in the water. Neoprene with a smooth inner and outer lining guards your body heat against chilly wind and spray. Fabric helps protect skin from UV light with a UPF rating of 50+. Rear zippered pocket has a stretchy loop to store a key. Adjustable hood features a hole for a ponytail. Hand wash the Roxy Sea Blazer Hoody Paddle Jacket in cold water and lay flat to dry.
short_description: Designed to get wet and stay warm, the Roxy Sea Blazer Hoody Paddle Jacket offers stylish lightweight insulation when you're paddleboarding, kayaking, surfing and otherwise playing in the water.
